name: Wine Institute
legal: 501(c)(6) in the United States of America
goal: Initiate and advocate public policy that enhances the ability to responsibly produce, promote and enjoy wine.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Customs, Food Safety, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
*Future trade negotiations between the United States and the EU
*Agreement between the United States of America and the European Community on Trade in Wine
